item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 14, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Starship Flight 5: Launch and booster catch [video] (1533 points | 927 comments)
2. Notes on Zero-latency SQLite storage in every Durable Object (63 points | 24 comments)
3. Refurb weekend: the Symbolics MacIvory Lisp machine I have hated (51 points | 11 comments)

8. Counterintuitive Properties of High Dimensional Space (27 points | 5 comments)

11. Show HN: I built Bazaari.io to make launching online stores simple and fast (12 points | 9 comments)

23. Node.js, Pipes, and Disappearing Bytes (65 points | 29 comments)
24. Design for Real Life (4 points | discuss)
25. Common Lisp implementation of the Forth 2012 Standard (95 points | 61 comments)
26. Ward Christensen (of BBS and XMODEM fame) has died (208 points | 46 comments)
27. DARPA is funding reef structures that will be colonized by corals and bivalves (98 points | 26 comments)
28. Restic: Backups done right (145 points | 65 comments)
29. Large language models reduce public knowledge sharing on online Q&A platforms (321 points | 279 comments)
30. Plop Boot Manager (11 points | 4 comments)
